Class Dungeon

java.lang.Object
fr.uge.backpackhero.model.level.Dungeon
public class Dungeon extends Object
Represents a dungeon consisting of multiple floors. Each floor contains rooms with various types such as enemies, treasures, merchants, etc.
Author:
Yacine

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Dungeon()
    Creates a new Dungeon with multiple floors predefined for the beta of the game.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Floor
    getFloor(int index)
    Returns the floor at the specified index.
    int
    getFloorCount()
    Returns the total number of floors in the dungeon.

  • Constructor Details

    • Dungeon

      public Dungeon()
      Creates a new Dungeon with multiple floors predefined for the beta of the game. The dungeon consists of 3 floors.

  • Method Details

      Returns:

    • getFloorCount

      public int getFloorCount()
      Returns the total number of floors in the dungeon.
